title: Apigee - View or download a specification
abstract:
# Apigee - View or download a specification
**    Preview    — Apigee API hub ** This feature is subject to the "Pre-GA Offerings Terms" in the General Service Terms section   of the [Service Specific Terms](/terms/service-terms#1) .     Pre-GA features are available "as is" and might have limited support.    For more information, see the [launch stage descriptions](/products#product-launch-stages) .
Specifications are documents that define details about an API. An API can have multiple specifications associated with it. These specifications are referred to as [versions](/apigee/docs/api-hub/versions) .
content:
## View a specification
There are multiple locations in the UI where you can view the specification.
In order for the button to be displayed in the UI, An API must have an associated [deployment](/apigee/docs/api-hub/deployments) , and that deployment must have  an associated [version](/apigee/docs/api-hub/versions) .
If enabled, a button (or link) is displayed in the following locations.  Click the button or link to open the spec.
- APIs list page, **Documentation** column
- API detail page, **General** pane
- API detail page, **History** tab, **Filename** column (displays a link)
- API detail page, **Deployments** tab, **Documentation** column## Download a specification
From the open spec, click **Download** to download the file.
